availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Kentucky native. Son of Jane Daugherty. Married to Mary Shackelford Daugherty in Lincoln County on March 8, 1853. Father of John F. Daugherty and Mollie Daugherty. Wagon maker in Lincoln County in 1850. Wagon maker in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District 2, p. 305A

Find A Grave, "William Daugherty (1831-1904)," Memorial #89894319, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/89894319 (accessed July 12, 2019).
